grams_per_ounce.name: settings.grams_per_ounce
grams_per_ounce.title: Grams Per Ounce
grams_per_ounce.description: What is the actual Sale Weight of grams per ounce?

sale_timeout_after_minutes.name: settings.sale_timeout_after_minutes
sale_timeout_after_minutes.title: Pending Sale Timeout (Minutes)
sale_timeout_after_minutes.description: When should a pending Sale be voided?

use_confirm.name: settings.use_confirm
use_confirm.title: Require Confirmation Scan for lookup in POS
use_confirm.description: Turn on if budtender is required to scan in all items as POS - if on, any item selected from the lookup will be added as unconfirmed - and only an admin (with adminpin) can override to proceed to checkout if not confrim-scanned.

communication_email.name: settings.communication_email
communication_email.title: Current Email Address for communication
communication_email.description: Our system is an automatic communication system, hence we need this to be live

communication_sms.name: settings.communication_sms
communication_sms.title: Mobile Number for Text/SMS Alerts
communication_sms.description: If you provide a phone number, you will be texted upon urgent communication

communication_ccemails.name: settings.communication_ccemails
communication_ccemails.title: A List of CC email addresses

communication_timezone.name: settings.communication_timezone
communication_timezone.title: Communications TimeZone
communication_timezone.description: Location TimeZone - Used to calculate time based discounts and backend (ie: email) communication

metrc_token.name: settings.metrc_token
metrc_token.title: Metrc API Token for this locations license

migration_prompt.name: migration_prompt
migration_prompt.title: Where will you be Migrating From?

migration_backfill_date.name: migration_settings.backfill
migration_backfill_date.title: Backfill Date
migration_backfill_date.description: Migrating will transfer all relevant data from the specified timeframe, starting with the Backfill Date and ending with the current date.

is_demo.name: is_demo
is_demo.title: Test/Demo Mode
is_demo.description: Select Yes if this suite is in a test or demo mode*

status.name: status
status.title: Location Status
status.description: You may hold or bump from activated to registered.  Only Super-Admin can do this!

values.name: Held
values.title: Held - Announce All Activities will be frozen

values.name: Denied
values.title: Denied - Users will be Denied Access upon next login

type.name: type
type.title: What Type of location is this?

admin_campaign_sms_limit.name: settings.campaign_sms_limit
admin_campaign_sms_limit.title: HB Admin Only: Locations Campaign SMS text limit
admin_campaign_sms_limit.description: When this number if sms texts are transmitted, then, halt any further campaign texts -- *ONLY EDITABLE BY A HOTBOX SUPERADMIN
